驅.definition: to expel; to urge on; to drive; to run quickly

驅使.definition: to urge; to prompt; to spur on; to order sb about

驅動.definition: to drive; to propel; drive (vehicle wheel); drive mechanism (tape or disk); device driver (computing software)

驅寒.definition: to warm oneself; to expel the cold (TCM)

驅役.definition: to order (sb) about; (by extension) to put to use

驅散.definition: to disperse (a crowd etc); (fig.) to dispel (misgivings etc)

驅策.definition: to urge (sb to do do sth); to drive (sb to take an action)

驅趕.definition: to drive (vehicle); to drive out; to chase away; to herd (people towards a gate)

驅車.definition: to go by car (as driver or passenger)

驅除.definition: to drive off; to dispel; to expel

驅除韃虜.definition: expel the Manchu, revolutionary slogan from around 1900

驅魔.definition: to drive out devils; to exorcise

驅魔趕鬼.definition: to exorcise; to drive out evil spirits
